H0.text: when does the day of the dead end. November 6

H1.text: when does the day of the dead end. October 31

H2.text: when does the day of the dead end. November 12

H3.text: when does the day of the dead end. November 2

A4.text: The Day of the Dead is traditionally celebrated on November 1 and 2.

A5.text: In Italy, November 2 is All Souls' Day and is colloquially known as Day of the Dead or Giorno dei Morti.
